import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const ManageUsers = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); // Mock users data const mockUsers = [ { _id: 'user1', name: 'Admin User', email: 'admin@enjoydrive.com', role: 'admin', createdAt: '2024-01-01T00:00:00Z', status: 'active' }, { _id: 'user2', name: 'John Doe', email: 'john@example.com', role: 'user', createdAt: '2024-01-15T10:30:00Z', status: 'active' }, { _id: 'user3', name: 'Jane Smith', email: 'jane@example.com', role: 'user', createdAt: '2024-01-20T14:15:00Z', status: 'active' } ]; useEffect(() => { // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { setUsers(mockUsers); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }, []); const filteredUsers = users.filter(user => user.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || user.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); }; const getRoleBadge = (role) => { return role === 'admin' ? 'bg-danger' : 'bg-primary'; }; if (loading) { return (

); }; export default ManageUsers;
